text:
The main advantage,
especially in regard to health care,

but for any professional
who is not in the health center 24/7,

is the possibility,
thanks to the cloud,
any time at which the health worker
needs health support,

medical support,
they can access, at any time,

whether it be on the computer
or through the application,
the health record.

In that moment,
the healthcare worker can see

the patient's history and see
what the worker wrote in that moment,

being able
to access it quickly and easily
and above all securely,
because the program allows

both the healthcare worker
and the patient him or herself
to access the data,

allowing for
the correct intervention.

This is an advantage which,
of course implies safety,
intuitiveness and speed of action,
which is a benefit for the patient.
With Advenias Care, the advantage

is the safety of the patient
at all times,

whether it be during a medical
or a public welfare intervention,

which aligns
with the patient's needs.

Therefore, the patient has
the ability and the chance

to feel protected, safe and,
above all, the chance to have

a targeted intervention
that instantly resolves the problem.
